TopicTitle: Mk1 fuel tank's now hold 400 not 150?

Articles.Content: Yea so im playing the game again after a month and stock Mk1 liquid fuel tank's now have 400 units when the exact parts on my ships are still 150. Is this new and when did it come out?

It is new-ish (post 1.0) and yes, I experienced the same thing, all my prebuilt craft had 150. try taking the .craft out of the save and reloading the game, then exit game and put .craft back in and see if the tanks update.

I don't know if that actually works, but it might.

Also, I think this goes into either gameplay questions or stock support, not sure which would suit it better.
open the .craft file in a text editor, ctrl+F, search for Mk1, scroll down to resources, update to 400, save, reload the craft in game
